# Site Design

> Universal template and design system for building product landing pages. Pure HTML/CSS/JS.

## About

Site Design is a template and design principles document for creating consistent, mobile-first landing pages. One universal layout: header, hero, features, footer. Standard brand: Lato + Sora fonts, #33334f / #6078ff / #999 palette. Dark mode with CSS variables. No frameworks, no npm, no build step.

- Author: [Maxim Osovsky](https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q107189449)
